channel.title: Nividia Online - Restarting the project!
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt]Nividia Online[/size][/center] [size=14pt][i][b]Introduction![/b][/i][/size]
Hello everyone, I've recently came back to RSPS. I'm willing to start up again, this time I want a team to help me. What happened to Nividia V2? Well it was coming along very well until my laptop crashed, than I lost the momentum to redo. I really need someone who is very experienced with clients, hence it's complicated a little for me. I'll take care of the server, and do everything I possibly can to improve it. I'm using the client/base Ahram 4 has released, and I will complete the following he hasn't completed.
Complete Started Not Started
[ul][li]The Incredible Learning Center[/li] [li]Far-range bows[/li] [li]Far-range magic[/li] [li]A Reasonable Starter[/li] [li]New hitmarks (If possible)[/li] [li]Critical Hits[/li] [li]Blocking spammers[/li] [li]Ability to press enter to login instead of clicking login[/li] [li]Vengeance on NPC[/li] [li]New curses[/li] [li]Extreme Potions[/li] [li]A life-like rsps dialogue such as "How are you doing?" from Man[/li] [li]Full doors[/li] [li]Pvp Armors (All effects and specials)[/li] [li]Chaotic weapons (Works just like RS)[/li] [li]Tormented Demons - Correct Emotes/GFX[/li] [li]Corperal Beast - Correct Emotes/GFX drops spirit shields/sigils[/li] [li]Perfect Staff of Light[/li] [li]Clipped Following[/li] [li]Combat following[/li] [li]604 Gameplay[/li] [li]RS Firecape[/li] [li]100% Skillcape Emotes[/li] [li]100% Pking[/li] [li]100% Bridding/Item Switching[/li] [li]Barrows and effects[/li] [li]Pk points and EP System[/li] [li]Perfect Xp rates[/li] [li]100% Dragon claws with perfected emote[/li] [li]100% All godsword specials[/li] [li]NO DUPES[/li] [li]THERE IS NO "DONATOR ONLY" ITEMS! You can add it (tutorial in it). Anyone can use anything if they have the proper requirements![/li] [li]Shops are located in Varrock[/li] [li]All spirit shields and their effects (Divine - Deducts 30% damage, Elysian - 70% chance to deduct, Arcane - +20 Magic Attack Bonus, and Spectral - +30 magic defence bonus)[/li] [li]A perfect economy server[/li] [li]Slayer helmet gives 50% extra exp when doing slayer[/li] [li]Lock exp[/li] [li]Every single skill works[/li] [li]Saradomin Sword Spec[/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2u6ch7t.jpg[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/351946d.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/j7thyd.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/14mrqty.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/auiphl.jpg[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/6p8gap.jpg[/img] Settings/Information [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/vgj7cx.jpg[/img] [size=14pt][font=trebuchet ms][i][b]Hiring:[/b][/i][/font][/size] [code] Beta-Testers Client-Coders [/code] [size=14pt][font=trebuchet ms][i][b]Application:[/b][/i][/font][/size] [code]Name: Age: Activeness: Experience: Msn:[/code] Message my inbox for the link to play.
